title: Emerald and Diamond Panakala Haaram: A Verdant Vision
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
G-H color) and oval-cut natural Emeralds (medium-dark green
good clarity). Gold chain is woven for strength and flexibility.
features: This Haaram features a graceful, cascading design. Emeralds are bezel set and surrounded by halos of sparkling diamonds. The diamond-studded leaf motifs intertwine with fan-shaped diamond pendants, creating a unique blend of traditional and modern aesthetics. The overall design evokes a sense of nature and timeless elegance.
occasions: or upscale festive occasions. Its modern design also makes it suitable for sophisticated cocktail parties and formal gatherings.
description: This Emerald and Diamond Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship. The rich green emeralds contrast beautifully with the rose gold and sparkling diamonds. The piece boasts exceptional brilliance, durability, and timeless elegance. A true statement piece that blends traditional South Indian sensibility with contemporary design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and adds to its overall luxurious feel.
